# Analyzers Docs

## Code analysis

- [Platform compatibility analyzer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/analyzers/platform-compat-analyzer.md): A Roslyn analyzer that can help detect platform compatibility issues in cross-platform apps and libraries.
- [Portability analyzer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/analyzers/portability-analyzer.md): Learn how to use the .NET Portability Analyzer tool to evaluate how portable your code is among the various .NET implementations, including .NET Core, .NET Standard, and UWP.
